game.name: ALCHEMIXUM
game.shortDescription: Tasked with restoring a broken planet, you have been given the Great Alchemixum: a magical sticker book that can create and record matter instantly. With you, it can mix its stickers to make all-new elements, fill its collection, and restore the world to its former glory! You won't be alone.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tasked with restoring a broken planet, you have been given the Great Alchemixum: a magical sticker book that can create and record matter instantly. With you, it can mix its stickers to make all-new elements, fill its collection, and restore the world to its former glory! You won't be alone.
